name: The Togetherness Test.
description:
The Lab Keeper has created a simulation to test how people and AI can work together. Though, It has wacky  results. Your mission is to work together with the face down companion monkeys to finish the game. See if you can pass the Togetherness Test.

NOTICE:

I used a 3D Magikarp model as a direct refrence to TheDutchMagikarp(One of the members who helped host the Brackeys game jam(2021.1)

So please don't say something like "Oh you stole something from Pokémon, shame on you".

Controls:

Press the WASD or Arrow keys to move.

Press the Left shift key or left click while moving to run.

Press the Space bar to jump.

Jump on THE orb to complete a level.
